titles.title: A bill to authorize the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan, design, and construct the West Court of the National Museum of Natural History building.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 9/15/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Board of Regents of the Smithsonian Institution to plan, design, and construct the West Court of the Museum of Natural History building. Prohibits the use of appropriated funds for such activities.
